detail_desc: Long-sleeved blouse in a soft viscose blend with a V-neck opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with three long-sleeved bodysuits and three pairs of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Wrapover bodysuits with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with a flounce-trimmed seam at the top and short, wide, broderie anglaise sleeves.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Cotton canvas shoes with lacing at the front, rubber toe caps, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.
Straight-cut blouse in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Elbow-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a hole-patterned front, a ribbed turtle neck and lace trim at the hem. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with hole-knit details. No buttons.
Blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck and decorative buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, short butterfly sleeves and a tie belt at the waist.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace trims at the hems.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.

Set with a short-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Patterned trousers with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and seams at the knees.
Waistcoat in twill with buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Sandals with narrow straps, covered block heels and elasticated ankle straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Jumper knitted in a cotton-blend with a cable-knit front and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with elastication at the top.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a washed denim collar and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with soft lace trims. Non-wired padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and double-layered frill around the neckline. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and tie at the back of the neck, long sleeves with a tie at the cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined in jersey.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an unlined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs, and a lace-trimmed hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hoop earrings in metal covered with plastic beads. Length approx. 5 cm.
Small scarf in patterned satin. Size 40x40 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Top in soft jersey with an interactive motif. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short corduroy skirt with a regular waist and buttons at the top. Unlined.

Long dress in chiffon with a lace bodice. Wide neckline, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain band and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Fully lined with support panels at the top.
Top in slub-weave jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-3Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Push-up bralette in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and racer back. No fasteners.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit in jersey and shorts in lightweight, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Bodysuit with a print motif on the front, lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Two pairs of skinny-fit jeans in different colours of superstretch washed denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), front and back pockets and a zip fly with a button.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and hem.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside and a stand-up collar with a zip and chin guard at the front. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif, stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a low-cut back with crossover straps. Medium coverage at the back.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.
Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones and plastic beads. Post at the bottom and a clip at the top. Length 3.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with a round neck, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Large elasticated scrunchie in an airy weave.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a lined hood and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a woven section at the front with pockets, one of which has a zip. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ribbed top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small ribbed stand-up collar. Narrow cut at the top and frills around the armholes.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.

Voluminous, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave. Elastication and a flounced trim at the top, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Striped, fine-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Small shoulder bag in glittery imitation leather with embroidery on the front, appliqués at the top and a faux fur pendant at the side. Zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud on one end. Lined. Size approx. 3.5x10.5x15 cm.
Embossed metal rings in various designs.
Jacquard-knit jumper in soft cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Hoop earrings in metal and bamboo. Diameter 4 cm.
Round-necked top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in viscose twill with pleats at the top, a concealed zip fly and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.
Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides. Size 70x180 cm.
Scarf in a patterned weave.
